resources.string:
Thanks for downloading Plainhome.
 This launcher aims to be very simple, as the colorful icons, the wallpaper, and even widgets get us to spend more and more time on our phone, I decided to make this to try and help to reduce their impacts.


If you want to set this launcher as default launcher, press the button under this message. If you change your mind, you can launch your old launcher through this one, and it will most likely prompt you to set it as default. Have a nice day. - @cursedastronaut on GitHub
